website_summaries.verdict: A silky, easy-to-use primer that's perfect for smoothing out large pores.
pros: Primer keeps large pores hidden all day
Effectively keeps foundation and blush in place and prevents them from separating
Silky primer is easy to apply and can be worn on its own to give skin a natural, poreless finish
cons: it is best to use a little at a time

customer_reviews.title: it felt like sticky, cold
customer_reviews.text: I am not convinced the product is authentic. The graphics on the tube are not consistent with my previous tube of the product (see photo) even though the photo on the Amazon page DOES match my old tube. The initial appearance of the product seemed consistent with my old tube. However, it felt like sticky, cold, wet goo when I applied it. I washed it off immediately! My previous experience with the product is that it feels soft and silky. Possibly it is old and expired? I will attempt to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Generic brand
customer_reviews.text: I should have read reviews first, but this is not the same product you would purchase from a cosmetic store. I've been using this primer for about 2-3 years and this is not the same. Guess this is a knock off as the texture is greasy and wet feeling. The real product is light, airy and like velvet! Also, box is damaged and tube looks like it's not full as if it is used.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying from a legit make-up store
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this from ULTA before and loved it. However, I don’t think this product is legit. It seems thinner and makes my face a little oily compared to the tube I got from ULTA. Buy with caution. It still works but does not provide the same pore-less finish
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: The best there is
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite primer, bar none. It completely changes the way your makeup looks. I can't get my face to look as smooth and blended if I'm not wearing this godsend underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I get it all the time from Sephora but when I found it for less in Amazon I was so happy. I can save more through amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Librum

customer_reviews.title: Great natural coverage!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It adds a teensy bit of glow to your skin while blurring any imperfections. It’s light, not greasy and once it’s on- you don’t even know you’re wearing anything. You look like yourself- but better.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Weaver

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE ORIGINAL FORMULA!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because the product pictured was the original formula... IT IS NOT THE ORIGINAL FORMULA!! I posted a pic of what was sent. For those of us who love this product, we know that the original is AMAZING but the new formula literally SMELLS, it does not fill in the pores like it used to, and the coverage is just ok. It’s false advertising to picture one product and deliver another. NOT COOL. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 at a time
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage - smooth and just enough to be very natural
customer_reviews.author: DSS

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, light, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Favorite primer, light, smooth and blends well. Helps with my large pores and redness. I use it with and without makeup to improve the look of my very fair, rosacea prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: G. McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing, under later for makeup. Used it for many years
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for many years. Hard to find on the big name websites. Glad to be able to get it from Amazon,
customer_reviews.author: BiolaNavy

customer_reviews.title: Seriously.. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have some acne scars from years ago. The pitted in ones and this stuff smooths them out better than anything I've ever found. I've been looking for like 20 years. I will not EVER run out of this! It's pretty colorless so it blends really well and doesn't look to thick or anything. It's pretty much invisible. I love it! It's the same price at beauty brands.
customer_reviews.author: MissCarrie

customer_reviews.title: Good for eyes terrible for face.
customer_reviews.text: Ok as an eye primer makes eyeshadow go on creamy. Just plain sucks as an overall face primer. Doesn't do anything for wrinkles, dry patches, but does make your skin slightly matte. Definitely have to use more than a pea sized amount to get any considerable coverage. To tell you the truth powder chafing gel works a million times better as a face primer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Smith

customer_reviews.title: I woke up like this...
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It makes my skin look absolutely flawless with very little effort and lasts all day. It is expensive but it is definitely worth the price based off how well it works and since you don't have to use very much at all it lasts for a while. This is definitely a must-have in my makeup bag from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool stuff!
customer_reviews.text: i have oily skin that gets flaky patches along my cheeks. This stuff is really great and smoothing everything out prior to application of make up and doesn't make your skin shinier or greasier. it's almost like magic and makes your face feel amazingly smooth and soft. I use mineral powder foundation and blush, and this helps everything go on evenly, and in my opinion, last longer. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product. works great on my oily skin. keeps my foundation in place all day. highly recommend if you have oily skin
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R

customer_reviews.title: Wear everyday!!
customer_reviews.text: I use everyday and this lasts forever. Even if I don’t put on makeup it gives me little polish. I get 6 months from a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Tim DeBaillie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: My go to primer didnt break me out light weight and has a blurring effect.
customer_reviews.author: kira galvan

customer_reviews.title: It’s good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the best but it works really well. Good coverage and lightweight. I don’t break out with it at all so that’s a plus! I just wish it filled the pours better!
customer_reviews.author: sean weeks

customer_reviews.title: DIminished appearance of pores with a smoother-looking complexion
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for diminishing the appearance of pores and giving my skin a smoother look. I especially like that it is tinted, so it may be used without additional foundation. I do think it’s a bit pricey for the tiny one ounce tube.
customer_reviews.author: Mpi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have super oily skin, so nothing is ever going to completely eliminate shine. But this helps quite a bit. I'd say it's the best oil control primer I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Acne Prone Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that primer was always kind of a joke for acne prone skin until I used this brand! it is more expensive than some of its competitors, but it will last me a long time. This primer makes my skin feel smooth and soft! This more natural product has not caused any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Silky smooth and not heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Silky smooth and not heavy. I wear moisturizer with SPF in it so I can get away with wearing this on top - I used to wear Covergirl with SPF in it but not as much anymore now that I have found this product. This product is so much lighter than other foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Lostie in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: I apply this prior to my foundation and when I use it people always comment on my makeup and say how great it looks
customer_reviews.text: I normally get this from Saphora but the price is the same and its easier to buy it from Amazon. I apply this prior to my foundation and when I use it people always comment on my makeup and say how great it looks. It give your a clean flawlessness look, love it.
customer_reviews.author: C&C

customer_reviews.title: Smoothes pores, greatly reduces ice pick scars, controls oil and leaves your face super soft
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! Wears great under makeup or alone. Best primer I’ve ever used. Can’t do my makeup without it. Sad to hear Sephora tell me this product is being discontinued or they’re revamping it. Product it great the way it is. So happy I was able to get it through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is better for younger skin
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is better for younger skin. On me it didn't do anything. Didn't smooth my makeup. Didn't help it go on better. Felt dryer than my regular foundation when I use it alone. Though I love Two-Faced products, not buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Noel R

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Too Faced Primed and Poreless for a few years and love it. Unfortunately it's been discontinued (creating new formula) and I happened to find it here for a great price. Ordered, received in 3 days : )
customer_reviews.author: Terra17

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never felt a need for a primer but bought this on a whim. I am addicted now. It feels great and really does smooth the skin. I use it with or without makeup and it looks awesome. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Glitter Goddess

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Sometimes I'll use too much and then ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Sometimes I'll use too much and then I think it can clog pores but besides that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Tkeisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels wonderful, so silky! Only wish it were less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: UScustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this stuff. It makes my makeup glide on easily!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Primed for Anything!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best "primer" I have ever tried! Really love how smooth it makes your face feel! Lasts a LONG time too, it doesn't take much, it just goes on SO smooth!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Yearout

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so far! I have fair skin and freckles, and my face ends up looking shiny by about Noon. However, since I'm in my mid-thirties, I don't want products that are drying. This primer is perfect. My makeup hasn't disappeared by the end of the day and my pores are not so noticeable anymore. Too Faced is so smooth and easy to work with - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: luvreading

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey for not enough effect
customer_reviews.text: This primer doesn’t smooth out pores as much as I’d like. There are less expensive alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy29

customer_reviews.title: It goes on so smooth one of the best primers
customer_reviews.text: Great product. One of the best primers on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love this primer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, my favorite for years! Smooth, Creamy and feels like satin while filling in those lines!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best primer I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer I have ever used. I'm 57 and this makes my skin look flawless and dewy. Well worth the price. Helps your makeup last all day through all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Primer
customer_reviews.text: This primer gives my skin a smooth texture and primes it well. It does not break me out. I have extremely oily and sensitive skin and am not delusional enough to think that a simple primer will cure that. I drink a glass of water with lemon and take B-Stress vitamin supplement daily.
customer_reviews.author: Alyt

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE. THIS IS NOT A TRUE PRODUCT OF TOO FACED.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like this, seems to minimize my pores, doesn't leave your face greasy
customer_reviews.author: Anna Vernotzy

customer_reviews.title: ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked to see that this product is not oil free. My face is somewhat oily and this doesn't seem to help in any sense. My face is splotchy with half of my make up off by mid day
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product but my face is slightly oily so it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but my face is slightly oily so it felt heavy and happen to increase the oiliness over the course of a day. I feel this would be a great product for those who do not have oily skin
customer_reviews.author: Angela Y Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product, it's light weight, adjusts to the tones of your skin and gives your skin a softer smoother appearance.
customer_reviews.author: dbridges

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: There is just a little bit of color to it. But that's ok, cuz it isn't supposed to be a foundation. It makes a smooth surface on your face and helps adhere make up so it stays longer. Doesn't make me break out, and has a silky feel. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria J. Faust

customer_reviews.title: Love :)
customer_reviews.text: Great primer. It has a slight tint to it so that it can be worn alone or under makeup. Applies smoothly and doesn't create a "greasy" look on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna O'Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this Primer for years and can difinitively say that the primer I received in this shipment is not the real product. Too Faced Primer is lightweight and airy, this has the consistency of greasy concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I'm on my third tube. Goes on so smoothly, feels like silk on your skin, and my powdered foundation applies more easily. My makeup application retains its freshness all day. I have combination skin, and still break out occasionally on my chin, but feel like Too Faced Primed and Poreless provides a barrier, to keep my skin cleaner throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: ok primer
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about the product, but don't believe it lived up to my expectations. It's definitely a nice "light" product and feels nice on your skin, but didn't notice the minimization of pore size and/or appearance.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Mehh, would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Weird smell, made my skin very dry and also made me breakout and I do not have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Nova

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great primer. I think I like it better than my Kat Von D Lock It Primer..
customer_reviews.author: LunaBell

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It takes away the shining from my forehead and covers the eye bag a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great primer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer! Not too thick or thin. Great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: soft, and the color makes it such that you really don't need makeup...you have a soft/wonderful texture to your skin...great primer! The color really makes it wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: WVBOOGWOODY

customer_reviews.title: It feels like satin on your skin and does not feel heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels like satin on your skin and does not feel heavy or too thick. I love how well it goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer
customer_reviews.text: I love the light coverage this gives by itself, but it's amazing when I mix a pea size drop in with my foundation. It's absolutely beautiful! They definitely made a customer for life out of me!
customer_reviews.author: Jilly Stras

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin feel so soft!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin feel so soft and it hides all my pores. I love this product. I would purchase it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Groh

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this using this as a base your ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this using this as a base your makeup slides on so easy. Wish it was a cheaper price!
customer_reviews.author: Reba Haggard Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and just ordered the one for sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and just ordered the one for sensitive skin! To me the sensitive skin one does not make your skin feel as soft as the regular one in the pink tube! I would highly recommend this product in the container reflected in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: and this is my favorite. I have large pores
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different primers, and this is my favorite. I have large pores. This really makes them unnoticeable!
customer_reviews.author: Sooner Girl

customer_reviews.title: but it's the best primer I've used
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey for sure, but it's the best primer I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does not settle in your pores and it is very silky feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and non greasy
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it smoothly goes on my face. I like the way it covers under my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bennett

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs this primer! It is absolutely amazing! My skin feels like silk after putting it on. You can wear it alone or sans makeup.. For a glowing look. Makes foundations and BBs go on a lot smoother so less product is used. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was the too faced product that impressed me the most. it fills the fine lines and gives you a beautiful even surface to work on.
customer_reviews.author: Sergent31563

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover enlarged pores and to help keep my makeup stay put longer. After a 7 hour day, I notice my makeup (I only use Lancome powder bronzer and occasionally eyeshadow) looks the same as if I didn't wear this primer, also I only notice slight pore coverage but nothing that a pharmacy brand couldn't do. Overall, the only thing this product has going for it is its great feel and texture, but after that theres nothing more I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes face feel smooth and ready for makeup. Can wear under makeup or alone.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a great primer.... this would be the one!
customer_reviews.author: jamis shopping addiction

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Applies smoothly, keeps me oil free most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peelman

customer_reviews.title: Tinted face primer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great primer. The slight tint added helps even out uneven skin tone. Glides onto the skin so makeup can glide right over it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Makes me break out if I use it for more than a few days.
customer_reviews.text: I like how this makes my face look but if I use it for more than a couple of days in a row, my face breaks out. Happens every time. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nielper

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, I'm not sure it really keeps the makeup on any longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: SarahAPRN

customer_reviews.title: let me say that I LOVE this primer
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that I LOVE this primer. Worth every penny. But... I order it through Amazon & it arrived one time but upon opening the package (under a bright light) I notice the tube was barely half full. Disappointed with having to pay almost $30 for half a bottle of primer.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice primer. I usually use smash box, but this is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the stuff! use it before foundation to cover pores and smooth out skin.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish!
customer_reviews.text: If you use any cosmetic on your face, start with this! It will make all the difference in the world. Beautiful finish!
customer_reviews.author: sally kansas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed as I have bought serval tubes of this product. This time the tube came nearly empty.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Bethay

customer_reviews.title: This feels nice and works okay
customer_reviews.text: This feels nice and works okay. I just don't think it is worth 30 bucks when I can find something that works the same way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: nice primer, doesn't hide pores
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, applies nicely and is a great primer but it does nothing to hide pores.
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Primer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a long time, and while I have occasionally tried another brand, have never found one better!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coverage...tried this product before and really recommend trying it if u just want lite coverage....moisture for excellent finish...try it!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: This beauty product is one of my favorites from Too Faced. A little bit goes a long way, feels smooth, and foundation goes on evenly with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I gave this 5 stars because it is light and smooth on your face and you helps your makeup look flawless..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this primer. Goes on really smooth and your skin feels velvety after it is applied. I don't see wearing it alone, but it is great under foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Jefflyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wear under make-up or w/o just for some coverage w/o make-up.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Great under loose powder!
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, my pores become more prominent, no matter what I do! A friend recommended I find a good primer and this is IT. I use it under Bare minerals and I never look greasy. It washes off easily and I swear my skin has improved since using it! It's pricey, yes, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMFDC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Makes skin silky soft. Doesn't help my oily skin though.
customer_reviews.author: mycavs

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A bit pricey for the amount you get. My makeup artist recommended I apply it to help smooth my aged skin.
customer_reviews.author: Birdgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy on skin :(
customer_reviews.text: This made me break out like CRAZY. I don't have very sensitive skin and am generally okay trying new products. However, this primer felt really heavy and just having it on for a couple of hours made my face freak out. I went with Smashbox instead, since it just feels lighter. If you want super heavy coverage, this is probably for you, but for a casual make up user like myself, this is a bit much.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like I get he longevity from this primer that I do with others of similar price but it s great to throw on I'd if going out for a few hrs or to wear alone for a quick trip to the store
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never found a primer like this one. It is not to gel or oily and when you put it on it doesn't feel like it is long and it last all day for me. I work with dog and get puppy kisses all day and it still stays on
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but I will keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I can only notice a subtle difference. I even forget to put it on, so it hasn't made dramatic difference that I can't go without it
customer_reviews.author: jbeech

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smooth on my face all day. I wear it alone as i don't like to wear foundation and my skin feels soft all day. It's colorless, but somehow brings out your natural skin color, but rejuvenated.
customer_reviews.author: Soledra

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew about this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff is great!! It is a great primer and really helps get your face ready for foundation. I have really oily skin and this has helped with that problem!! I really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: melissa grise

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I won't be buying this product again. Just not impressed with it. Based on the other positive reviews, I thought that I was buying magic in a bottle.. Not so much. I'll use it til it's gone but I won't be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: helps to apply makeup easier and it may hide pores cher mariette
customer_reviews.text: Not certain how much t helps though it does make application of makeup easier
customer_reviews.author: roger kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! i have suffered for years with oily, greasy looking skin on my face and enlarged pores. This is the only thing that has ever worked for me! A little bit goes a long way, I just apply a small amount all over my face before I apply my makeup. My face appears smoother and I don't have to worry about it looking like a glazed donut by 9 am!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this primer!
customer_reviews.text: It's a difficult thing, to find the right primer. I have tried them all, Tarte, Smashbox.. you name it and this is the only one that does it for me. I tried the oil-free version of this and had to return it, it was like vaseline on my face. This creates a velvety, even complexion I love it! I also like the bronze for the summer. I recommend this highly, I really love Too Faced! their eye shadow sets are gorgeous, I can't say enough about this product. The 1 o/z also will last you a very long time, 4 to 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Skin
customer_reviews.text: I was using Urban Decay make-up which was slightly pricier than this brand, but I think I like Too Faced even better now. The products go on great. They come in really cute vintage looking packaging and the convince of getting them through Amazon is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: mskolnik1992

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great-- it makes your makeup last forever or, if you don't use it with make up, it minimizes pores and makes your skin look great.
customer_reviews.author: aklgmi

customer_reviews.title: Not for Oily, sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and smooth my skin is, but it makes me break-out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Akin

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last very long
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love too faced cosmetics, but it was pretty pricey for the amount you get. Lasted me like 2 months tops, using it a couple days a week
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

product_meta.title: Too Faced Cosmetics Primed and Poreless, 1-Ounce
product_meta.description: This one-of a-kind makeup primer was scientifically formulated to wear under bronzers and foundation powders, or alone, to achieve the look of flawless skin without makeup! Vitamins A and C, mulberry extract and a powerful dose of retinol virtually banish pores while tired skin is left hydrated, firmer, and detoxified. Primed and Poreless creates the perfect canvas to allow powders, bronzers and foundations to airbrush onto the skin seamlessly and perfectly blended. Skin appears brighter, fresher and younger. Color stays true and in place all day. Customized formula: provides an airbrushed canvas as it preps skin for bronzers, powder products and foundations. Bronzers glide on without grabbing or looking heavy. Powders float above imperfections. Makeup applies like magic onto skin. Color stays true and in place all day.
